import Header from "../components/Header"; import Footer from "../components/Footer"; import { useState } from "react"; const goods = [ { id: 0, type: "Подушка", name: "Memory Foam Roller", article_num: "121231311231", color: "белый", size: "60 x 40 x 12", price: 2120, old_price: 2430, count: 1, }, { id: 1, type: "Подушка 2", name: "Memory Foam Roller 2", article_num: "121231311231", color: "белый", size: "60 x 40 x 12", price: 2120, old_price: 2430, count: 1, }, ]; function Cart() { function deleteGoods(good_id) { goodsState.forEach((element, i) => { console.log(element.id, good_id); if (element.id == good_id) goodsState.splice(i, 1); }); } const [goodsState, setGoodsState] = useState(goods); return (

    {goodsState.map((good) => { return (

    { deleteGoods(good.id); console.log("test"); }} />
    ); })}
); } export default Cart;
